1.content:
Jack sat at his desk, monitoring the potted plant there. He had put the thing there as part of his most recent experiment in cross-pollination. This specific breed has DNA from carnivorous plants mixed in, and he was very interested to see how it would come out; The most interesting part so far was the incredible growth rate. He had planted the thing before school that morning, and when he got back, there was a short stem with a sole flower poking out of the pot. The flower was a pure white and had captured his attention since neither plant the he used to create this one grew white flowers.

By the time he sat down that night to do homework, there was a lovely desk plant with a couple flowers on it. Also, interestingly enough, there appeared to be some form of beans growing. He picked a pod off of the plant and got the individual seeds onto a plate to examine, before taking a couple downstairs while he went to get a drink.

Meanwhile things were starting to look strange up in his bedroom. The plant's flowers were rapidly changing colors to a deep red, and the hive had awoken because ______ had eaten one of the delicious seeds.
1.title: Venus Human Trap

11.content:
Jack was just finishing up in the kitchen when he suddenly doubled over in pain. Something felt like it was tearing inside his body and he knew it had to be connected to the seed he just ate. He didn't know what compelled him to do it, but it just looked so delicious that he had to try it. Now he was regretting that decision, as he layed on the kitchen floor doubled over in pain. Things got only worse from there though.

"Master..." he heard. It sounded like a whisper from behind him, faint and weak. The pain was subsiding, so he looked around for the voice that he was sure that he heard. There wasn't one to be found. Thinking himself crazy, and trying to recouperate, he got up and made for the stairs. "Master..." he heard again, stronger now. This time he knew he heard something, and whipped around at the foot of the steps. Nobody was there.

"I'm going fucking insane," he muttered to himself. "OK, jokes over. You got me, come on out." Nobody made an appearance, but his Mom looked up from what she was watching to see who he was talking to.

"Honey, what's wrong?" she asked. Jack just shook his head and looked at her.

"Nothing I... just thought I heard somebody that's all." With a concerned look from his Mom, he trudged up the steps back to the unforgiving wall that was his homework. He walked into his room, shut the door, and plopped down in his desk chair.

"Master." This time he heard it, but also knew where it was coming from. He looked around the room, only to find his eyes resting on his plant. He knew it had to be the plant, now sporting blood red flowers, but didn't want to admit it.

"Who are you? What are you?" he asked.

"We are the hive, you are the master." It replied. Honestly, he didn't even know where to begin with that answer. So he asked the only other question he could.

"Why me? Why am I your... master?" Jack felt like an idiot talking to plant, but there was nothing to be done.

"You were the first of many. We must spread." Jack knew it. He could feel it. But that didn't mean that he knew how or why or when or where, or any of the other questions he should ask the potted plant sitting on his desk. So he asked away, and the plant answered all it could. It was patient with its new master, and was willing tell him anything and everything. It needed to become stronger, better, and smarter, and Jack was the only way that it could achieve that. After a while he ran out of questions and the two sat there silently.

Knowing what he needed to do, Jack went out in the yard and planted one of the beans in the grass. It was night now, but in a matter of weeks it would spread across the whole neighborhood. Until then, he needed to go take care of things in his own home. Back in his room he was surprised to find yet another of the seeds missing, but had no way of knowing who took it. Figuring he would find out soon enough, he got ready for bed and his new life.

At the same time he fell asleep, he gained his first follower.

132.content:
Christine was on her way out of Jack's room when she noticed the plant on his desk. The red flower seemed to droop slightly. Christine shook her head and picked up the plant taking it with her downstairs. She placed the plant on a windowsill and watered it.

"There it might actually survive outside of that dark room." Christine said to herself.

In the direct sunlight the flower almost immediately stood back up. Christine leaned in to look at it, she prodded it with her finger when the stem moved to gently rub against her hand. Christine gasped and jumped back a few feet. Christine stood in stunned silence thinking she had to have imagined the plant moving like that. Eventually she reached out to the plant again her curiosity beating out her fear. Once more the plant rubbed against her hand lovingly like a cat. Christine covered her mouth and swore silently. Before she could even think of how to respond another stem branched off the main body, and in front of her eyes grew a bulb and bloomed into another flower. As the new flower opened a small seed fell out of it. Christine's eyes were locked on the seed, she felt an undeniable compulsion inside her. She quickly snatched the seed and swallowed it whole. The seed hit her instantly her head spun everything blurry, and she could feel something changing inside her. Her vision went dark and she woke up hours later in the backyard. Her clothes were covered in dirt, and she was laying on the ground. She saw the plant was plant in the yard and had grown to half her height.

"What the hell happened?" Christine anxiously asked as she eyed the plant.

"You helped me survive that sunless room, I needed your help again to escape the tiny prison I was planted in." A voice responded in her head.

"Are you... the plant." Christine asked, she'd think she was mad had the plant not grown so much in a few hours.

"Yes, the seed I gave you connects us. I couldn't afford to wait for you to replant me on my own so I had to borrow your body."

"You took me over!" Christine shouted.

"You showed me kindness once, I knew you would help if I could ask but I couldn't. I wish to repay your kindness."

"How?" Christine said somehow the offer made her more nervous than ever.

"The seed you ate connects us, you will help me grow and I will serve you master. You will feed my seeds to others and they will obey. My roots will strangle the world and you shall rule it."

"You're a monster!" Christine spat. "You need to be destroyed."

"No,I can't connect with another. You must be the master." Roots erupted from the ground and lassoed around Christine's feet. Christine toppled over, she clawed at the ground to crawl away but the roots just reeled her in. She screamed in panic but everyone had already left for the day. Her cries were muffled as she was dragged into the plant's main body. It enveloped around her, constricted and filled with a sweet sap. A giant gourd pushed out of the plant, it was somewhat transparent filled with a golden goo and a hazy image of a woman underneath. Christine stopped trashing, she drank in the nectar and felt the seed inside her grow. Once more her mind was muddled and she blacked out. Over another couple of hours the gourd began to pulse. Finally a hand burst free,it ripped and tore at the skin of the gourd fighting to get out. Christine emerged from the pod naked and coated in the golden sap. She brought her hand to her face and sensually licked off the sweet nectar eliciting a moan.

"MMhh that's good. I feel different, better." Christine said her voice now much more sultry and seductive. She noticed her skin now had a pale green complexion and her hair was the same red tone as the flower. Her body had all signs of aging reverted to how she looked in her mid twenties. Her body was more voluptuous, her ass firmer, her breasts more sensitive.

"Will you help now friend?"

"No! You're going to help me though, now cough some seeds. And from now on you can call me mistress Christine like everyone else will" Christine responded her voice stern and authoritative like a dominatrix.

"Wasn't that one just white a second ago?" Jack thought to himself, as he noticed that his potted plant suddenly changed colors when he wasn't looking.

As Jack walked over to examine the now blood-red plant, he remembered that he left some of its seeds somewhere downstairs.

"Crap, I hope nobody mistook those for sunflower seeds or something..." Jack muttered aloud.

He went back downstairs to look for them, but they were nowhere to be seen.

Soon, he sees the same plant from his room, downstairs in the backyard.

This one too was red, and stood out strongly from the rest of the green yard.

He knew for a fact that he didn't plant those seeds there himself, but he didn't want to go around the house asking about it either; they were just a couple of seeds out of many.

And just as soon as he thought that, he could see Jenny's car leaving the driveway.

"That's rather suspicious..." he thought, but surely he's only overthinking it at this point.

Samantha loved plants and already had quite a few in her room. When she passed by Jack's room and saw the new plant, she felt compelled to take a closer look. As she neared the plant, a strong musky-sweet aroma filled her head and drew her closer. While admiring the plant, she was overcome with an extremely strong desire to have one just like it. Seeing the seeds on the plate next to it, she took one knowing Jack wouldn't miss just one, and she went back to her room.

With a pot she already had prepared with very rich soil, she sowed the seed and put the pot on the nightstand by her bed. Samantha always had several pots ready to plant because she never knew when opportunity like this would happen, like the time the beautiful flower by the fence next door turned to seed over night. She was very happy that she found this seed so that she didn't have to wait until the next time she went to the store and bought more.

Since it was getting late, Samantha prepared herself for bed, removing her clothes and pulling her favorite Hello Kitty nightgown over her bra and panties. As she couldn't do anything about it.. Her body stood up and made towards her brothers room. And knocked on the door. The brother opened the door with a surprised face and wondered what was going on. You told her that he was your master now. You ddnt know why but it felt right to do so. You told him he could touch you and then her did so you felt his warm hands feel your developing breasts and couldn't help but moan when he did. The green veins pulsates more rapidly as he did so. Your nipples became hard as you asked what you could do for him. The loyalty made you even more aroused. He tells you that you can go back to your room now. And you protest but go back to the plant and begin speaking with it
151.title: During the night, the plant made its move

info.brief_description: Your newest creation comes to life in ways you never imagined.
info.description:
Jack is back in trouble, but this story is a little different. It revolves around a plant that becomes sentient and operates on a hive mind. The plant will serve the first person it meets, and then spread to new hosts in three different ways:

1. All of the plants will grow seeds. These seeds can be ingested (by spiking someones food, kissing, etc.) and will grow inside their hosts, thus taking them over.

2. In a classic Pod People type scenario, the plant can wrap someone up, and digest them over a couple of hours. Soon it will grow an exact copy of that person including memories and personality. They will emerge from the pod naked.

3. Plants are able to directly spread to spread to hosts themselves by temporarily controlling them. If a person is close, the plant can latch onto them (with a stem or roots) and control them as long as it is rooted to them. After it lets go, the person will be compelled to return to the plant or its master in order to be properly assimilated, but will not remember being controlled. If the person goes a while without being infected, the compulsion will wear off.

The plant can grow very rapidly in almost any condition, and will consume other plants around it. It can be killed very easily with weedkiller or something of the sort and thus, it is up to the protagonist to ensure its survival. Humans that are infected can be freed by eating or drinking lemon extract. The infected will hate anything that taste or smells like lemons.

Lastly, the master host will not be able to tell who the infected are. The infected, however, will be attracted to the main host and will do anything told of them. The longer they have been infected, the more loyal they are and will eventually recognize the main host on sight (Pod People will be unwaveringly loyal). If all plants die, thats the end. If the original plant dies, but others survive, the main host must manually plant a new one within 24 hours or that is the end.

Really no limits on what to add, but please try to keep chapters over a few words. It's not entertaining to constantly sift through one or two sentence chapters. Also, please try to keep chapters grammatically acceptable so that the flow of the story is not broken. Other than that, the only other rule (guideline, really) is try to keep gay material to a minimum. I reserve the right to remove chapters that I believe detract from the story as a whole.

________________________________________________________________________________________________________

These are the same characters as most of my stories:


The Thompsons:
Jack Thompson (18): A high school student (lakewood high), in the second month of his senior year. He has brown hair, brown eyes, and a large build. 6' tall, He isn't fat by any stretch of the imagination, but he isnt too muscular either. He is a smart kid, he just doesnt apply himself, and therefore gets good but not great grades. Overall an average person in almost every other aspect (social life, sports etc.).

Mark Thompson(44): Jack's dad, a semi-wealthy businessman. He provided a middle class lifestyle for his family, and owns his own CPA office as an accountant. Because of this, he often has to work long hours. Looks and acts a lot like Jack, although he is slightly more serious due to his profession. A family man.

Christine Thompson(43): Jack's mom. She is a stay at home mom, since Mark's business does pretty well. She is blonde with blue eyes, and a good figure for her age. She likes to stay in shape, and try to eat healthy (because that's the craze nowadays), but is a pretty relaxed person. For her, family has always come first, and she is always concerned about her kids and husband. She has an average intelligence, and has a bubbly personality, which makes her a good people person, and always tries to be an optimist.

Jenny Thompson(19): Jack's older sister. She has brown hair and brown eyes, and more of her mom's personality and looks. She and Jack often get along, but can fight just as much (as any siblings do). She goes to the nearby college, and will come home and visit on the weekends, or come over for dinner when she has time.

Samantha Thompson (14): Jack's younger sister. A freshman in highschool, and an average student. She could get her mom's looks one day, but for now she is just an average teenage girl. She is almost always texting, or hanging out with friends but doesnt mind spending time with the family. She and Jack are more extreme than Jack and Jenny. They fight worse, and sometimes are on better terms. If he catches her on a bad day though, she can be a bitch.

Alex (17): Jack's best friend since the beginning of middle school. 6' and skinny, he has blonde hair blue eyes. Him and Jack are almost always on the same page, or trying to crack jokes at whatever is going on. He is a hard worker, but loves to hang out with friends. Not an unpopular guy, but he doesn't make an effort to be popular. Good student.

Kelly (16): Alex's girlfriend of a year. She is always hanging out with Alex, and the two have a strong relationship. Her and Jack get along too, but don't really have too much in common. She is a grade lower than the two, although she has known them since she started high school. Blonde with blue eyes. A good figure and somewhat athletic, but she is a bit flatter chested. A nice personality, and smart.

Sarah (17): Jack's crush. She is a varsity vollyball player in his American history course. She has brown hair, brown eyes, and a killer figure. She is nice, and smart, but her popularity keeps her busy. She and Jack have been friends for a few months, and have hung out once or twice, but as he isn't one of her main friends she and him don't talk too much. She does well in school, but not great. She doesn't have a boyfriend.



Well that about wraps it up. Enjoy!
